briefTitle: Efficacy of Buscopan® in Comparison With 654-II (Anisodamine) in Acute Gastric or Intestinal Pain
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-blind, Independent 3rd Party Unblind, Active-controlled, Parallel-group, Multi-center Trial, in Contrast With Anisodamine (654-II), 10mg, to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Buscopan® Solution for Injection, 20mg (Intramuscularly) for the Treatment of Acute Gastric or Intestinal Spasm-like Pain
summary: The aim of the study is to assess the efficacy of Buscopan® (hyoscine butylbromide) in comparison to 654-II (anisodamine)in acute gastric or intestinal spasm-like pain.

primaryOutcome.measure: PID From Pre-dose Baseline at 20 Minutes After First Injection.
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline and 20 minutes after the first injection
